means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 坦克德来源于诺曼底人名，日耳曼语，含义是“思考+勇敢的，坚强的”(thought+hardy,brave,strong)
[人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 坦克德职业名称，制桶者或制酒杯者，或绰号，酒鬼，来源于中世纪英语，含义是“桶，杯”(tub,cup)

sentence.Network_en: Ben Tankard wowed the crowd with his jazz.
sentence.Network_cn: 本·坦卡德的爵士乐使众人为之叫绝。

sentence.Network_cn: 刻有他姓名首字母的玻璃大酒杯

sentence.Network_en: I poured the beer into a tankard.
sentence.Network_cn: 我把啤酒倒进了大酒杯里.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (denoting a large tub for carrying liquid): perhaps related to Dutch tanckaert

entry.tran: (带把手的金属制的)大啤酒杯
entry.def: A tankard is a large metal cup with a handle, which you can drink beer from.

means.word_mean: 1. large drinking vessel with one handle
